Dialogue.text: Good morning, Sector 7! Today is Jeha {current_day}. In {days_to_overlord} days, Overlord Aso will be making his historic trip.

Dialogue415.text: It'd take something like a pandemic to stop that trip.

Dialogue424.text: In other news, the outbreak of the CX-6 virus has been declared a pandemic in Sector 6.

Dialogue433.text: While most will recover, many experience long-term side effects and even death.
